data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts - Seeker's Selects Weapon Pack
data.detailed_description:
The ultimate sniper starter pack, gain a strategic advantage with Seeker’s handpicked trio of deadly companions. The Seeker’s Selects DLC Weapons Pack features three great looking, heavy-hitting weapons; the Marcus Tactical 8, FFF-45 ACP and ROCK AS100.

Featuring:

  • Marcus Tactical 8 - A powerful sniper rifle with improved stability, Siberia won’t know what hit it
  • FFF-45 ACP - An assassin’s best friend, this specialised pistol uses luring ammo to lead unsuspecting foes to an untimely end
  • ROCK AS100 - A magazine-fed shotgun with the option to fire either buckshot or slugs, we’ll let you decide which is more effective… and more fun

*Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts base game. Not usable in multiplayer.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Czech, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
